1.name: Mi amante es mi mano derecha
1.title: Mi amante es mi mano derecha
1.title_es: Mi amante es mi mano derecha

plot: &"Midori No Hibi&", also known as &"Midori Days&" is a story about a boy and a girl. Not a normal story, however, but one very entertaining story if anything. Seiji, who was known for his &"Demon Right Hand&" particularly named that for his keen sense of fighting skills and long streak of getting his way by clocking a guy in the face, woke up one morning to find his right hand was now a woman. A girl, rather, and one that loved him so much she had wished so hard to be close to him, she got her wish. Imagine what could transpire if you have a tiny woman for a hand, and you are in high school. That is Midori No Hibi.   Written by  Jackie
title: Midori no Hibi

plot_en: &"Midori No Hibi&", also known as &"Midori Days&" is a story about a boy and a girl. Not a normal story, however, but one very entertaining story if anything. Seiji, who was known for his &"Demon Right Hand&" particularly named that for his keen sense of fighting skills and long streak of getting his way by clocking a guy in the face, woke up one morning to find his right hand was now a woman. A girl, rather, and one that loved him so much she had wished so hard to be close to him, she got her wish. Imagine what could transpire if you have a tiny woman for a hand, and you are in high school. That is Midori No Hibi.   Written by  Jackie
